9.ara-name: كتاب الحج عن رسول الله صلى الله عليه وسلم

hadiths.text: Abu Razin Al-Uqaili narrated:That he went to the Prophet and said: "O Messenger of Allah! My father is an elderly man who is not able to perform Hajj nor Umrah nor undertake a journey.' He said: 'Perform Hajj on behalf of your father and perform Umrah
